name: Space Hamster
description:
Race time in challenging and puzzling zero gravity mazes, avoid obstacles and get everything you need to escape from the space lab.

Hamstrong is a Space Lab's Hamster who is noticed by himself, i mean, one of his clones who could escape in the past, that there's just a tiny chance of set him free from the experiment.

Actual Game Features

- Original Game Mechanic!
- 24 levels
- Original Soundtrack

Future Game Features

- A Mind Blowing Story :P
- More than 40 levels!
- Optional extremely hard levels
- 3 Game Modes
- Enter the Hall-ogram of fame
